name: Halloween Galaxy (Alpha Build for testing) (Spooktober gamejam)
name_original: Halloween Galaxy (Alpha Build for testing) (Spooktober gamejam)
description:
A short free visual novel made for the Spooktober Visual Novel Gamejam 2020.

Plot synopsis:

A soul floats through a strange Halloween themed galaxy, running away from a monster. They come across 3 planets:
A world where stuffed bears fight monsters in order to protect their owner.
A world where a girl defies her parents wishes to have the Halloween she has always dreamed of, with a friend.
And a bleak future where Halloween has ceased to exist.

(As of 09/27/2020, this game is still a WIP, please let me know of any issues you have when trying this alpha build)
